Jasny\HttpMessage\ServerRequest

Representation of an incoming, server-side HTTP request.

    Synopsis

    Methods

    protected

    • buildGlobalEnvironment() — Build the global environment
    • copy() — Clone the server request.
    • dereferenceProperty() — Remove referencing from properties
    • reset() — Remove all set and cached values

    public

    • __construct() — Class constructor
    • isStale() — The object is stale if it no longer reflects the global environment.
    • revive() — Revive a stale server request
    • withGlobalEnvironment() — Use superglobals $_SERVER, $_COOKIE, $_GET, $_POST and $_FILES and the php://input stream.
    • withoutGlobalEnvironment() — Return object that is disconnected from superglobals

    Inherited from Jasny\HttpMessage\Message\Headers

    protected

    • copy() — Disconnect the global enviroment, turning stale
    • determineHeaders() — Determine the headers based on other information

    public

    • getHeader() — Retrieves a message header value by the given case-insensitive name.
    • getHeaderLine() — Retrieves a comma-separated string of the values for a single header.
    • getHeaders() — Retrieves all message header values.
    • hasHeader() — Checks if a header exists by the given case-insensitive name.
    • initHeaders() — Public function to create header object
    • withAddedHeader() — Return an instance with the specified header appended with the given value.
    • withHeader() — Return an instance with the provided value replacing the specified header.
    • withoutHeader() — Return an instance without the specified header.

    Inherited from Jasny\HttpMessage\ServerRequest\ParsedBody

    protected

    • copy() — Disconnect the global enviroment, turning stale
    • getContentType() — Get the MIME from the Content-Type header
    • parseBody() — Parse the body based on the content type.
    • parseBodyIsRequired() — Check if the body needs to be (re-)parsed
    • parseJsonBody() — Parse json body
    • parseUrlEncodedBody() — Parse 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' body
    • parseXmlBody() — Parse XML body
    • resetParsedBody() — Reset the parsed body, excepted if it was explicitly set
    • setPostData() — Set as parsed body, but only if Content-Type is of form upload
    • shouldUsePostData() — Check if we should use post data rather than parsing the body

    public

    • getBody() — Get the body
    • getHeaderLine() — Get a header as string
    • getParsedBody() — Retrieve any parameters provided in the request body.
    • getServerParams() — Get the server paramaters (typically $_SERVER)
    • withParsedBody() — Return an instance with the specified body parameters.
